routes.name: review_user_memory
utterances: Can you show me my stored preferences?
What details do you have about my past activities?
I'd like to know what data is collected about me.
What insights do you have from my journal entries?
What data do you have on me?
What information is stored about my preferences?
I'd like to review the data you have on me.
routes.description: The user wants to review the data that Squeak to Speak has collected about them.

routes.name: find_therapist
utterances: Help me find a therapist that focuses on trauma and offers online sessions.
Help me find a therapist that works with teens and is within my budget.
Help me find a therapist that offers sliding scale fees and is in my area.
Help me find a therapist that specializes in anxiety and is affordable.
Help me find a therapist that accepts insurance and is located in downtown.
Help me find a therapist that provides cognitive behavioral therapy and is close to me.
routes.description: The user wants to receive a personalized recommendation for a healthcare professional.

routes.name: find_support_group
utterances: Help me find a support group that focuses on LGBTQ+ issues in my area.
Help me find a support group that addresses PTSD in my city.
Help me find a support group that focuses on anxiety in New York.
Help me find a support group that meets online for depression.
Help me find a support group that focuses on parenting challenges in Chicago.
Help me find a support group that supports addiction recovery near me.
Help me find a support group that discusses stress management in Los Angeles.
Help me find a support group that deals with grief in my area.
Help me find a support group that meets weekly for anxiety support.
routes.description: The user wants to find support groups in their vicinity.

routes.name: find_hotline
utterances: Help me find a hotline that is available 24/7 for emergencies.

Help me find a hotline that can assist with abuse situations.
Help me find a hotline that offers immediate crisis support.
Help me find a hotline that provides support for depression.
Help me find a hotline that I can call for non-emergency advice.
Help me find a hotline that focuses on addiction support.
Help me find a hotline that specializes in mental health issues.
routes.description: The user wants to access the contact information for emergency or non-emergency hotlines.

routes.name: habit_alternatives
utterances: Suggest an alternative for snacking on chips.
Suggest an alternative for eating fast food for lunch.
Suggest an alternative for drinking coffee in the afternoon.
Suggest an alternative for using plastic water bottles.
Suggest an alternative for drinking soda every day.
Suggest an alternative for scrolling on my phone at night.
Suggest an alternative for skipping my workouts.
Suggest an alternative for procrastinating on my tasks.
routes.description: The user wants to find a healthier or more sustainable alternative to a habit they currently have.

routes.name: insert_mood
utterances: Today, I feel really happy and grateful for my friends.
Today, I feel energized and ready to tackle my goals.
Today, I feel excited about starting my new project.
Today, I feel a little sad but hopeful for tomorrow.
Today, I feel calm and at peace with my surroundings.
Today, I feel overwhelmed with everything going on.
Today, I feel a bit anxious about my upcoming presentation.
Today, I feel frustrated with the lack of progress.
Today, I feel nostalgic thinking about my childhood.
routes.description: The user wants to record their thoughts, feelings, or reflections by making an entry in their journal or mood board.

routes.name: insert_journal
utterances: I want to add to my journal today: I had a great conversation with my colleague.
I want to add to my journal today: I felt really anxious about my presentation.
I want to add to my journal today: I felt overwhelmed but managed to stay positive.
I want to add to my journal today: I reflected on my goals and felt motivated.
I want to add to my journal today: I felt happy when I received good news.
I want to add to my journal today: I felt a sense of accomplishment after finishing my project.
I want to add to my journal today: I'm grateful for my supportive friends.
I want to add to my journal today: I enjoyed a peaceful walk in the park.
I want to add to my journal today: I struggled with my emotions but found some clarity.
routes.description: The user wants to contribute a message of gratitude or positivity to the community gratitude banner.

routes.name: insert_gratitude
utterances: I am grateful for the opportunity to learn something new today.
I am grateful for the beautiful sunset I saw today.
I am grateful for the kindness of strangers I experienced this week.
I am grateful for the small victories I achieved this week.
I am grateful for the support of my friends during tough times.
I am grateful for the peaceful moments I found in nature.
I am grateful for the warm cup of coffee that started my day.
routes.description: The user wants to contribute a message of gratitude or positivity to the community gratitude banner.
